description:
JOIN US FOR THIS FIRST VIRTUAL REALITY EVENT IN BELGIUM

WHEN: November 14, from 13h - 19h

WHERE: Microsoft Innovation Center 

SCHEDULE:

13h00 : VR Tech Demos

Pixel Rift, Softkinetic, Video-Stitch, Jaunt VR, Wolfstein VR, Darkfield VR,

VRPhobia, Lisa, FeasyMotion

14h00 : Welcome and Brief Introduction on Virtual Technology

Juan Bossicard, impulse.brussels

14h15: Current state of VR

Eric Krezlo, Softkinetic

14h30 : Keynote Speech: "My story and why I am excited about VR"

Ana Ribeiro - Game developer and creator of Pixel Rift game

15h00 : Corporate perspective on VR:

Microsoft

Barco

15h30 - 17h30 : Thematic breakouts and roundtable Heatlhcare  VRPhobiaLisaFeasyMotionBrenda Wiederhold

Art/ Entertainment/ Advertising

Video-Stitch 

Ouat

Active Me

Virtual Walk

Jean-Ignace de Villenfagne

Gaming and Serious gaming 

Pixel Rift

WISE Research Group

Darkfield

Andrea Di Stefano


 17h30 : VR in Brussels: Opportunites, expertise and financing


18h00 : Live chat with Virtuix Omni CEO (The omni) Jan Goetgeluk

18h15 : Closing - Presentation of the Dutch VR Meetup Group and official launch of Brussels VR Meetup

Daan Kip, CEO of VR Factory

18h30: Networking and Demos

PLACES ARE LIMITED, PLEASE REGISTER HERE!

Contact: [masked]


 

This event is free, register NOW: https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-vrpresencebrussels-12905987155
name: Join us for the first event about Virtual Reality in Belgium
